author: CBR
description:
In this Heroes Journey Podcast clip, the writers of Star Trek: The Last Starship open up about their future with the series — and why their plan for the story is more focused and finite than fans might expect. 

They tease what 2026 could hold, why they’re committed to this specific corner of the Star Trek universe, and how the fate of the series beyond 12 issues depends on what happens next.

🎙️ Clip from CBR’s Heroes Journey Podcast – Episode 9.

- Watch the full episode here: https://youtu.be/RRjvIuJBwhA
- More Heroes Journey Podcast episodes: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfpipp6KbWs4apsUf5fIcxVw1cpaXXWxg
